title: Role of women in art academies

content.prompt: Which of the following statements best characterizes the relationship of women artists and art academies during the eighteenth century?

choices.label: Women were received into art academies on the same basis as men.
Women had an easier time being accepted by art academies than men had.
Women saw few benefits in applying to art academies, so they did not do so.
Women were the exception at most art academies.
